name: Curivari - Gloria de Leon - Prominente
additionalNotes: A Nicaraguan puro, like the rest of their line, the Gloria de Leon is a premium, small-batch, medium to full-bodied cigar constructed of authentic Cuban seed Corojo and Criollo tobaccos. This cigar is visually striking and is reminiscent of the cigars coming out of Cuba during the golden years. The flavor profile is rich and loaded with notes of spice, cream, black cherry, coffee, and cocoa.
